bug.author: jindrahelcl
bug.description: the model runs, but learns nothing

comments.comment: Are you sure it was because of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ufal/neuralmonkey/pull/152>#152</denchmark-link> ? My <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ufal/neuralmonkey/pull/151>#151</denchmark-link> refactor brought so many bugs, I would suspect it may have happened there as well.
It stopped working before the merge of your refactor. I have mentioned it somewhere.
My training of a model today also didn't learned anything.
